Introduction

Lee Hyuk Jae, also known as Eunhyuk, is a South Korean singer, rapper, songwriter, actor, radio host, MC, and concert director under ODE Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group SUPER JUNIOR and its sub-units SUPER JUNIOR-T, SUPER JUNIOR-M, SUPER JUNIOR-H, and SUPER JUNIOR-D&E.

On October 20, 2021, he released his first solo digital single, "Be".
